40004.zh: 失败!未找到对应会员账号!
40004.en: fail! The corresponding member account is not found!

40005.en: Failed to match the odds tray!%s platform，%s，%s!

40006.zh: 失败!实时赔率获取失败!
40006.en: fail! Failed to get the latest odds!

40007.zh: 暂未分配账号权限，请联系上级管理员!
40007.en: Account rights have not been assigned. Contact the upper-level administrator!

40009.zh: 该方案关联过滤器已被删除!
40009.en: The scheme association filter has been removed!

40012.zh: 失败!未查询到对应组织或者该组织没有权限!
40012.en: fail! The corresponding organization is not queried or the organization has no permission!

40014.zh: 失败!未查询到所在组织或者所在组织没有权限!
40014.en: fail! The organization is not queried or the organization has no permission!

40015.zh: 失败!未查询到对应的授权会员!
40015.en: fail! The corresponding authorized member is not found!

40016.en: fail! The member account already exists!

40017.zh: 失败!未找到对应ip，操作失败!请先创建ip!
40017.en: fail! The corresponding proxy ip is not found, the operation failed! Create an ip address first!

40018.zh: 失败!未找到对应分组，操作失败!请先创建分组!
40018.en: fail! The corresponding group is not found, the operation failed! Create a group first!

40019.zh: 失败!未找到对应来源，操作失败!请先创建来源!
40019.en: fail! The corresponding source is not found, the operation failed! Create a source first!

40020.zh: 失败!未找到对应货币，操作失败!
40020.en: fail! The corresponding currency is not found, the operation failed!

40021.zh: 失败!IP已经被使用，操作失败!
40021.en: fail! The proxy ip is already in use, cannot create a member!

40022.zh: 失败!用户初始化失败！请联系管理员!
40022.en: fail! User initialization failed! Please contact the administrator!

40023.zh: 失败!用户登录失败！密码错误或者代理ip不可用!
40023.en: fail! User login failed! The password is incorrect or the proxy ip address is unavailable!

40025.zh: 失败!不能读取其他用户信息!
40025.en: fail! annot read other user information!

40026.zh: 失败!该分组未分配会员账号!
40026.en: fail! No member account has been assigned to this group!

40027.zh: 失败!该工作组无符合该场比赛盘口条件的会员账号!
40027.en: fail! The working group does not have a member account that meets the requirements for the game!

40030.zh: 失败！未查询到该比赛，请检查比赛是否结束！
40030.en: fail! The match is not found. Please check whether the match is over!

40032.zh: 失败！下单失败的订单无法获取订单截图！
40032.en: fail! Order screenshots cannot be obtained for failed orders!

40033.zh: 失败！未查询到用户，请检查用户是否激活!！
40033.en: fail! No user is found, please check whether the user is active!

40034.zh: 失败!未找到对应方案，操作失败!请先创建方案!
40034.en: fail! No solution found, operation failed! Please create the scheme first!

40035.zh: 失败!未找到对应过滤器，操作失败!请先创建过滤器!
40035.en: fail! No filter found, operation failed! Please create the filter first!

40036.zh: 失败!该方案关联过滤器已被删除!
40036.en: fail! The scheme association filter has been removed!

40037.zh: 用户还未配置，需要先配置!
40037.en: The user has not been configured and needs to be configured first!

40038.zh: 当前比赛可能已经结束，查询失败!
40038.en: The current contest may have ended and the query failed!

40039.zh: 暂未分配账号权限，请联系上级管理员!
40039.en: Account rights have not been assigned. Contact the upper-level administrator!

40040.en: The working group is not authorized!

40041.zh: 用户还未进行账号配置，无法下单！
40041.en: The user has not configured the account, can not place an order!

40042.en: This working group has no member account!

40043.zh: 该工作组无下单平台会员账号！
40043.en: The working group does not have an order platform member account!

40044.zh: 请输入正确的订单状态！
40044.en: Please enter the correct order status!

40045.en: fail! The proxy ip address already exists!

40046.zh: 失败!未找到对应登录规则，操作失败!请先创建登录规则!
40046.en: fail! The corresponding login rule is not found, the operation failed! Create a login rule first!
